reviewText: Enjoy old time westerns like zorro

was as I expected, lots of action, and cowboys with ever shots. I like these old serials. yes, they don't have much plot and the acting isn't that great but it sure makes up for it with plenty of action. I was disappointed was I seen that it wasn't a manufactured disc but a burned one, you can tell that it was taken from a tape, but what do you expect from alpha video, don't what to go out of there way to make a A- one product. Still this is a fun serial to watch and as everything you expect from a serial. Great cliffhanger and Republic made some of the best.
Very nice but I do wish Zorro was actually mentioned outside the title.
zorro and the black whip these fantastic dvds to watch in fact my husband can keep on playing them as he says he can see something difrent every time he watches them good old tymer
